magnetic_triangle.kennedy_principle: Message → Market → Media (in that exact order)

message.core_promise: The ONLY productivity book designed specifically for Startup founders aged 28-35 who've raised Series A funding
proof_points: Tested with 100+ Startup founders aged 28-35 who've raised Series A funding
Guaranteed results in 30 days or money back
Only book that addresses Can't scale past 14-hour days without losing control of the business
message.irresistible_offer: The 4-Hour CEO: How I Went From 80-Hour Weeks to $2M Revenue + Bonus Materials + 30-Day Guarantee + Limited-Time Pricing

market.primary_avatar: Startup founders aged 28-35 who've raised Series A funding

market_temperature.warm: People who've engaged with related content
market_temperature.cold: Target avatar who hasn't heard of you yet

week_1_message: Finalize core promise and unique mechanism
Write and test all copy variations
week_2_market: Map customer journey from awareness to purchase
week_3_media: Launch paid campaigns to primary channels
Begin content marketing in target communities
Activate email sequences for different temperatures
week_4_optimize: Refine message based on market feedback

kennedy_quote: The foundation of any marketing is knowing exactly who you want your customers to be
